metadata.description: Batch 002 - Additional 30 SRT situations covering all 9 categories with authentic SSB scenarios

situations.situation: You are leading a team on a night patrol when you notice one of your soldiers is limping. The mission is time-sensitive. What will you do?
During a military exercise, your subordinate suggests a better strategy than yours in front of the entire team. How will you react?
You are given command of a demoralized platoon after their previous officer left. What will you do first?
Two of your best soldiers are competing for a promotion and it's affecting team coordination. What action will you take?
You are assigned to lead a team with members much older and more experienced than you. How will you establish your authority?
You have limited ammunition and must decide between helping a wounded comrade or pursuing the enemy. What will you do?
Your commanding officer orders you to take an action you believe is tactically wrong. How will you respond?
You receive two urgent orders simultaneously - one to secure a position and another to evacuate civilians. What will you prioritize?
You must choose between using the last medical supplies on a severely wounded soldier or saving them for potential future casualties. What will you decide?
During a mission briefing, you realize the intelligence provided may be outdated. The operation starts in 30 minutes. What will you do?
Your camp is under sudden artillery fire and soldiers are panicking. Communication with headquarters is lost. What immediate action will you take?
A fire breaks out in the ammunition depot at night. The fire brigade is 20 minutes away. What will you do?
During flood relief operations, your team's boat capsizes. You can see civilians trapped on rooftops. How will you manage this crisis?
Your unit is trapped behind enemy lines with dwindling supplies. Rescue is 48 hours away. What plan will you implement?
You discover that classified documents have been leaked from your unit. The investigation points to a close friend. What will you do?
A senior officer asks you to overlook a minor violation committed by his relative. How will you respond?
You witness a fellow officer accepting a bribe from a contractor. He is your course mate from the academy. What action will you take?
You are temporarily in charge when a visiting VIP demands special treatment that violates camp protocol. How will you handle this?
Your subordinate made a mistake during an operation while executing your orders. The blame is falling on him. What will you do?
You are responsible for maintaining sensitive equipment that malfunctions due to your oversight. An important operation is scheduled. How will you respond?
Your team is falling behind schedule on a joint military exercise due to lack of coordination with another unit. How will you address this?
A new member of your team has different working methods and is not blending well with the group. What approach will you take?
During a critical mission, two team members have a heated argument that disrupts operations. How will you resolve this?
A soldier in your unit is facing severe family problems and his performance is declining. Other soldiers are complaining. How will you handle this?
You overhear seniors making inappropriate comments about a female officer in your unit. What will you do?
A subordinate comes to you with a personal problem that requires immediate leave, but you're short-staffed. How will you respond?
You are ordered to advance but realize an unmarked minefield lies ahead. Delaying means losing strategic advantage. What will you do?
During combat, you can either take cover or expose yourself to draw enemy fire away from your wounded comrade. What action will you take?
You are assigned a task that you have no prior experience with and failure could impact your career. How will you proceed?
You receive conflicting information from two reliable sources regarding enemy movement. Your next move depends on this information. What will you do?
